metadata.title: CVE-2017-0423 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in Bluetooth could enable aproximate attacker to manage access to documents on the device. This issueis rated as Moderate because it first requires exploitation of a separatevulnerability in the Bluetooth stack. Product: Android. Versions: 5.0.2,5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1. Android ID: A-32612586.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
